Description: Start date of MMWR week/MMWR month period (for aggregate reporting)
End date of MMWR week/MMWR month period (for aggregate reporting)
Calculated Case Counting Date, otherwise specify (Note: if other, please reach out to have your date included in valdiation value set. Strong preference for hierarchical date types)
Name of the disease (e.g., measles, pertussis)

Subspecies, type, strain, or other distinguishing classification of the disease or pathogen that is important for reporting and tracking. For invasive meningococcal disease, this enables the option to provide serogroup once/if it is available. "disease_subtype" is not required and should be left NA if nothing to report.
Abbreviation for the reporting state, city, or territory
Two-letter abbreviation for the state or territory of the jurisdiction
Type of sub-jurisdiction level geography unit (ie county, planning area)

Name of the county or other sub-jurisdiction level geography unit in which the case occurs; "international resident" should be reported for cases reported from a jurisdiction but that are an international resident.
Aggregate count of specified outcome for the specified group for this time period
Epidemiologic outcome reported (NOTE for pilot: cases only)
